metaTitle: Luxury 4 Sovrum Villa Jávea €1,285,000 | Cap Martí Views
metaDescription: New build 4-bedroom villa with panoramic views in exclusive Cap Martí, Jávea. Pool, 1000m² plot, 5 mins to El Arenal beach. Premium Costa Blanca living.
